MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell, affecting properties in Stanefield Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of it and only became aware of this at 5.34AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating a fault on our underground cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8.15AM on 22 November 2020.
